1.title: The Gulf Coast of Mississippi

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Katie Lee finds the best beach food along the Gulf Coast of Mississippi. From Biloxi to Ocean Springs, she enjoys seafood gumbo, the best ribs below the Mason-Dixon Line and a steaming cup of chicory coffee with a buttery biscuit.

2.title: The Pacific Coast Highway

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Katie Lee finds irresistible, international beach food along California's Pacific Coast Highway. From Italian cioppino with local Dungeness crab to Mexican pork mole and candy apples, this road trip is a culinary success.

3.title: Tybee Island

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Katie Lee heads to Tybee Island, Georgia, and starts her culinary tour of beach favorites with local shrimp and a spicy blackened fish hoagie. The local specialty, oysters, are so nice, she tries them twice -- roasted and baked.

4.title: The Bahamas

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Katie Lee jaunts to Nassau, Bahamas, for local specialties including conch salad, chicken patties and a Bahama Mama cocktail. She savors uniquely Bahamian barbecue with local spices and grabs a Guava Duff for dessert.

5.title: The South Carolina Coast

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Katie Lee finds the best Lowcountry beach bites in some quaint towns along the South Carolina coast. She samples crab cakes eggs Benedict and banana bread French toast and can't leave without trying the shrimp and fried chicken.

6.title: Catalina Island

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Katie Lee lands on Catalina Island and heads to historic Mt. Ada for a juicy lamb burger with a view. Local vegetables rule in California, and when they're paired with wine, Katie discovers they're even better.

1.title: Doing the Island Hop

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Ahi tuna nachos and Caribbean stewed chicken are among the food highlights, when Katie Lee goes island hopping in this series. The premiere also includes a kayak trip for a burger with a unique twist; and Katie harvests ingredients for oyster escabeche.

2.title: Hometown Heroes

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Caribbean squash and a popular Mexican liquor are among the hometown favorites Katie Lee discovers in her travels.

3.title: Authentic Eats

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Hostess Katie Lee discovers authentic beach cuisine that stays true to its local origins. Included: a Georgia barbecue; chile rellenos in Mexico.

4.title: Family Recipes

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Hostess Katie Lee is hitting the beaches for tried-and-true family recipes. Included: classic Mexican dishes with personal family flair; and a Cuban-influenced ice cream shop.

5.title: Twist on a Classic

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Highlighting new and inventive ways that meals are prepared around the world. Included: a Florida created Reuben sandwich made with snapper; an ice cream sandwich pressed like a panini in Georgia.

6.title: Beach Bar Snacks

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Coastal canteens are on the agenda when Katie Lee goes to Mexico for sepes and St. Barbs for chicken skewers with a hint of rum.

7.title: Unexpected Hits

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Season 1 ends with Katie Lee being enticed by spring rolls in Puerto Rico and a delectable Napolean in Georgia's Gideon Isles.

1.title: Every Day Is Fry Day!

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Katie Lee is on a mission to find the best golden-fried goodness on the beach. She tries a perfect Fried Seafood Platter in South Carolina, Chicken Fried Wagyu in Alabama and mans the wok in Hawaii to fry a perfect whole fish.

2.title: Grilled & Que'd

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Nothing goes better with the beach than grilling and barbecuing, so Katie's hunting down the best dishes. She finds Grilled Mango Jerk Chicken in Florida, Grilled Fish Tacos in San Diego and traditional Hawaiian barbecue in Maui.

3.title: Beachside Breakfasts

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Katie Lee hunts down breakfasts by the water. She tries a modern version of a classic Hawaiian breakfast in Honolulu, gets a bite of Corn Beef Hash in Gulfport, FL, and livens things up with Dirty Chai Pancakes in San Diego.

4.title: Sweet Indulgences

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Katie Lee enjoys decadent donuts in Arizona and sticky buns in South Carolina; California represents with the Cococarma, a coconut, caramel, ice cream skillet cookie; Katie serves classic shave ice in Oahu and a flourless chocolate cake in Maui.

5.title: Gettin' Spicy

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Katie tests her heat index in San Diego by trying 37 different levels of hot wings; Katie visits a Cajun hot spot in Charleston, S.C., to learn about the Gullah-inspired blackened trout called The Islander.

6.title: Stuffed

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: What's better than delicious beach food? Stuffed delicious beach food! Katie's amazing food finds include Brisket-Stuffed Jalapeno Poppers in Florida and Lau Lau, a Hawaiian dish made with pork and fish stuffed into taro leaves.

7.title: Off the Eaten Path

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Katie tries food that seems off the beaten path: a Peanut Butter and Jelly Burger in Sullivan's Island, S.C , a sushi restaurant when she tries the Fried Chicken Sushi Roll in Myrtle Beach, S.C, Mac and Cheese Pancakes and Pho-Strami in Hawaii, the Lobster Egg Roll in Florida and the Crab "BLTA" in California.

8.title: Cheesy Breezy

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Katie toasts the gooey-est of dairy delights, from cheese curd taco shells and chorizo fundido to shrimp au gratin and goat cheese truffles.

episode of.title: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (TV Series 2015– )

akas: Beach Bites with Katie Lee (United States)
plot: Hostess 'Katie Lee' (qv) goes island hopping in a search for great cuisine on America's shorelines in this series.::anonymous
